name: simple-comparator
description: A production-ready deep equality comparison library for JavaScript and TypeScript, supporting complex objects, arrays, and primitive types with circular reference detection. Works seamlessly across Node.js, Deno, and browser environments.

scripts.build: rm -rf dist_commonjs/* dist_es6/* && tsc --project tsconfig-commonjs.json && tsc --project tsconfig-es6.json && npm run minify
scripts.minify: for file in $(find dist_commonjs dist_es6 -name '*.js'); do terser "$file" -c -m --source-map "content='${file}.map',url='$(basename ${file}).map'" -o "$file"; done
scripts.test:
npm run lint:all && jest && jest -c jest-node.config.json && command -v deno >/dev/null 2>&1 && deno test --config tsconfig-deno.json || echo '
ℹ️  [33mDeno is not installed. Skipping Deno tests.[0m'
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint && npm run lint:md && npm run format

author: dominikj111
